trans-unit.resname: F06·1 | Elves of Deep Shadow | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "They are aberrations who have turned on everything we hold sacred. Let them be cast out."\n—Ailheen, Speaker of the Council
trans-unit.target: "They are aberrations who have turned on everything we hold sacred. Let them be cast out."\n—Ailheen, Speaker of the Council

trans-unit.source: Armadillo Cloak
trans-unit.target: Armadillo Cloak

trans-unit.source: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.
trans-unit.target: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. Whenever enchanted creature deals damage, you gain that much life.

trans-unit.source: "Don't laugh. It works."\n—Yavimaya ranger
trans-unit.target: "Don't laugh. It works."\n—Yavimaya ranger

trans-unit.source: Terminate
trans-unit.target: Terminate

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.
trans-unit.target: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

trans-unit.source: Like his mother before him, Darigaaz gave his life defending Dominaria from the tyranny of self-styled "gods."
trans-unit.target: Like his mother before him, Darigaaz gave his life defending Dominaria from the tyranny of self-styled "gods."

trans-unit.source: Lobotomy
trans-unit.target: Lobotomy

trans-unit.source: Target player reveals their hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.
trans-unit.target: Target player reveals their hand, then you choose a card other than a basic land card from it. Search that player's graveyard, hand, and library for all cards with the same name as the chosen card and exile them. Then that player shuffles.

trans-unit.source: Goblin Warchief
trans-unit.target: Goblin Warchief

trans-unit.source: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblins you control have haste.
trans-unit.target: Goblin spells you cast cost {1} less to cast. Goblins you control have haste.

trans-unit.source: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.
trans-unit.target: They poured from the Skirk Ridge like lava, burning and devouring everything in their path.

trans-unit.source: Wild Mongrel
trans-unit.target: Wild Mongrel

trans-unit.source: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Discard a card: Wild Mongrel gets +1/+1 and becomes the color of your choice until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: It teaches *you* to play dead.
trans-unit.target: It teaches *you* to play dead.

trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices a creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
trans-unit.target: Target player sacrifices a creature. Flashback {5}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

trans-unit.source: The pits have their own form of mercy.
trans-unit.target: The pits have their own form of mercy.

trans-unit.source: Circular Logic
trans-unit.target: Circular Logic

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard. Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)
trans-unit.target: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1} for each card in your graveyard. Madness {U} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

trans-unit.source: Astral Slide
trans-unit.target: Astral Slide

trans-unit.source: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: Whenever a player cycles a card, you may exile target creature. If you do, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
